name: Breeze
short_description: Luxurious coastal residence with panoramic ocean views
description: Breeze is a residential project that embraces its coastal location with an architecture that blurs the lines between indoor and outdoor living. Floor-to-ceiling windows capture breathtaking ocean views, while the design incorporates natural ventilation to bring the refreshing sea breeze throughout the home. Sustainable materials and energy-efficient features make this luxury residence environmentally conscious.
